title: Second Temple, Jerusalem
description: The so-called "Second Temple" in Jerusalem stood on the northern edge of the Dome of the Rock and was destroyed in A.D. 70 during the Roman siege.

properties.description: Representative point derived from OpenStreetMap on the northern edge of the Dome of the Rock, at the site of the First and Second Temples. Destroyed in 70 A.D. during the Roman siege.
properties.title: OSM location of Herod's Temple
